headline: 1 Industrials Stock with Solid Fundamentals and 2 to Be Wary Of
summary: Whether you see them or not, industrials businesses play a crucial part in our daily activities. Still, their generally high capital requirements expose them to the ups and downs of economic cycles, and the market seems to be baking in a prolonged downturn as the industry has shed 11.8% over the past six months. This drop was worse than the S&P 500’s 2.2% fall.
